title: Banned with no reform card?

replies.body:
Thanks for being patient with those support agents! They can get a little underwater sometimes as you might imagine. 

For your own well-being, I did go ahead and look into the ticket to make sure it was in the queue as well as what the ban was for exactly. Your ticket is definitely there, just make sure not to send any replies until we do, otherwise it might be bumped to the back (the system is a little funky sometimes). Also, it looks like there was some pretty shifty stuff happening on your account at one point which could have been signs of a hacker or someone with malicious intent, which is why the account is locked.

You should get a response in that ticket soon, and everything will be kept safe on your account until you're verified and back in the game.
Thank you sooo much! I suspected my account was suspended for something like this since I didn't get the reform card, I've gone ahead and changed my password as well.  Thanks again for your help!
